_header: In hot summer these airs thou take
Note: Followed by 5395 and 4171, inserted among miscellaneous prose receipts.
_description: A book of medical recipes in English verse and prose, beginning imperfectly

CamTCC921.First Lines:
In hote somere þese erbes þou takeAnd styllyd watere of
                    hem þou make…
CamTCC921.Last Lines:
…þerof make plastres gode &And warme lay it to pyntel
                    thyne
CamTCC921.Note: Latin rubric headings for each recipe.
